! Command: show running-config
! device: rtr4 (vEOS, EOS-4.27.3F-cloud)
!
! boot system flash:CloudEOS.swi
!
no aaa root
no username admin
!
username ec2-user nopassword
username ec2-user ssh-key ssh-rsa  9cnfl-key
!
agent KernelFib environment KERNELFIB_PROGRAM_ALL_ECMP='true'
!
switchport default mode routed
!
transceiver qsfp default-mode 4x10G
!
service routing protocols model ribd
!
hostname rtr4
ip name-server vrf default 172.18.0.2
!
snmp-server community arista ro
snmp-server host 63.33.42.193 version 2c arista
no snmp-server enable traps
snmp-server enable traps snmpConfigManEvent arista-config-man-event
!
spanning-tree mode mstp
!
aaa authentication policy on-success log
aaa authentication policy on-failure log
!
interface Ethernet1
   no switchport
   ip address dhcp
   dhcp client accept default-route
!
interface Ethernet100
   no switchport
!
interface Loopback0
   ip address 192.168.4.4/32
!
interface Tunnel0
   mtu 1394
   ip address 10.101.101.4/24
   ip ospf network point-to-point
   ip ospf area 0.0.0.0
   tunnel mode gre
   tunnel source interface Ethernet1
   tunnel destination 172.18.70.156
   tunnel path-mtu-discovery
   tunnel ttl 10
!
interface Vlan10
!
ip routing
!
router ospf 1
   router-id 192.168.4.4
   redistribute connected
   max-lsa 12000
!
end
